entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
